sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { TariffService } from '../../services/tariff.service'; import { ShippingResult } from '../../models/tariff.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-calculator', templateUrl: './calculator.component.html', styleUrls: ['./calculator.component.scss'] }) export class CalculatorComponent implements OnInit { form!: FormGroup; destinations: string[] = []; result: ShippingResult | null = null; submitted = false; showResult = false; // Para búsqueda / filtro de destinos filteredDestinations: string[] = []; searchTerm = ''; constructor( private fb: FormBuilder, public tariffService: TariffService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.destinations = this.tariffService.getDestinations(); this.filteredDestinations = [...this.destinations]; this.form = this.fb.group({ origin: [{ value: this.tariffService.origin, disabled: true }], destination: ['', Validators.required], weight: [ null, [Validators.required, Validators.min(0.01), Validators.max(30)] ] }); } filterDestinations(term: string): void { this.searchTerm = term; this.filteredDestinations = this.destinations.filter(d => d.toLowerCase().includes(term.toLowerCase()) ); } onSubmit(): void { this.submitted = true; this.showResult = false; if (this.form.invalid) return; const { destination, weight } = this.form.getRawValue(); this.result = this.tariffService.calculateShipping(destination, Number(weight)); if (this.result) { // Pequeña animación al mostrar resultado setTimeout(() => { this.showResult = true; }, 50); } } onReset(): void { this.submitted = false; this.showResult = false; this.result = null; this.searchTerm = ''; this.filteredDestinations = [...this.destinations]; this.form.reset({ origin: this.tariffService.origin }); } get weightError(): string { const ctrl = this.form.get('weight'); if (!ctrl || !ctrl.errors || !this.submitted) return ''; if (ctrl.errors['required']) return 'El peso es obligatorio.'; if (ctrl.errors['min']) return 'El peso debe ser mayor a 0 kg.'; if (ctrl.errors['max']) return 'El peso máximo permitido es 30 kg.'; return ''; } get destinationError(): string { const ctrl = this.form.get('destination'); if (!ctrl || !ctrl.errors || !this.submitted) return ''; if (ctrl.errors['required']) return 'Selecciona un destino.'; return ''; } }
📦

ODM Envíos

Calculadora de tarifas desde CDMX

Versión 1.0

Cotiza tu envío

Ingresa los datos de tu paquete para obtener el precio estimado de envío.

El origen siempre es Ciudad de México (CDMX).

{{ destinationError }}

{{ weightError }}

Rangos disponibles:
📄 Sobre (<0.1 kg) 📦 < 1 kg 📦 1–10 kg 📦 11–20 kg 📦 21–30 kg
✅

Precio estimado de envío

Origen {{ tariffService.origin }}
Destino {{ result.destination }}
Peso ingresado {{ result.weight }} kg
Categoría {{ result.weightRange }}
Total estimado {{ result.price | currency:'MXN':'symbol-narrow':'1.2-2' }} MXN

* El precio mostrado es un estimado con base en la tabla de tarifas ODM. El costo final puede variar según dimensiones, tipo de empaque y condiciones de servicio.
